MemberSignature.Value: public override sealed Java.Lang.StringBuffer Format (Java.Lang.Object object, Java.Lang.StringBuffer buffer, Java.Text.FieldPosition field);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class Java.Lang.StringBuffer Format(class Java.Lang.Object object, class Java.Lang.StringBuffer buffer, class Java.Text.FieldPosition field) cil managed

Docs.param: the source object to format, must be a Date or a Number. If object is a number then a date is constructed using the longValue() of the number.
the target string buffer to append the formatted date/time to.
on input: an optional alignment field; on output: the offsets of the alignment field in the formatted text.
Docs.summary: Formats the specified object as a string using the pattern of this date format and appends the string to the specified string buffer.
Docs.exception: if object is neither a Date nor a Number instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Util.Date Parse(string string) cil managed

Docs.param: the string to parse.
Docs.summary: Parses a date from the specified string using the rules of this date format.
Docs.exception: if an error occurs during parsing.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Java.Util.Date Parse (string string, Java.Text.ParsePosition position);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Java.Util.Date Parse(string string, class Java.Text.ParsePosition position) cil managed

Docs.param: the string to parse.

input/output parameter, specifies the start index in string from where to start parsing. If parsing is successful, it is updated with the index following the parsed text; on error, the index is unchanged and the error index is set to the index where the error occurred.
Docs.summary: Parses a date from the specified string starting at the index specified by position.
